titles.title: Supporting the facility under development by the Stanislaus County Ag Center Foundation, in Stanislaus County, California, known as the National Ag Science Center.
Supporting the facility under development by the Stanislaus County Ag Center Foundation, in Stanislaus County, California, known as the National Ag Science Center.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Conservation, Credit, Energy, and Research.

bill.summary: Supports the facility under development by the Stanislaus County Ag Center Foundation, in Stanislaus County, California, known as the "National Ag Science Center."
